definition: to offer (tribute)/to present respectfully (to superior, ancestor, deity etc)/to esteem/to revere/to believe in (a religion)/to wait upon/to accept orders (from superior)
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: First, China sticks to the principle of independence.
sentences.chinese: 第一，中國始終奉行獨立自主的原則。

sentences.english: Reiterating that the Australian government will firmly pursue the one-China policy, Howard said he fully agrees to the proposals.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亞政府堅定奉行一箇中國政策。

sentences.english: He reaffirmed that his country firmly pursues the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 他重申，斯里蘭卡堅定地奉行一箇中國的政策。

sentences.english: In addition many early nudists practiced vegetarianism and engaged in daily exercise.
sentences.chinese: 此外許多早期裸癖者奉行素食主義並忙於日常運動。

sentences.english: Ghaddafi spoke highly of China's independent foreign policy of peace, saying that China is a great nation in its development.
sentences.chinese: 卡扎菲高度評價中國奉行的和平外交政策。

sentences.english: The Bolivian government adheres to the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 玻利維亞政府堅持奉行一箇中國政策。

sentences.english: Toledo also reasserted that the Peru government will firmly follow the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 托萊多還重申，祕魯政府堅定地奉行一箇中國政策。

sentences.english: You won’t often see abundance-minded people running the outrage script.
sentences.chinese: 你很少看到思想豐富的人奉行義憤腳本。

sentences.english: Consequently, to attract and to accept foreign immigrants have become a national policy long observed by Canada.
sentences.chinese: 吸收外來移民，是加拿大長期奉行的國策。

sentences.english: He emphasized that Afghanistan unswervingly pursues the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 他強調阿毫不動搖地奉行一箇中國政策。

sentences.english: He also vowed that Denmark would play an active role in developing Europe-China relations and reaffirmed Denmark's adherence to the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 丹麥將繼續奉行一箇中國政策。

sentences.english: Diallo noted that since its independence, Guinea has always pursued the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 迪亞洛表示，幾獨立以來，一直奉行一箇中國政策。

sentences.english: Susilo also indicated that Indonesia resolutely pursues the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 蘇西洛還表示，印尼堅定奉行一箇中國政策。

sentences.english: Zia reiterated that Bangladesh will continue to follow the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 齊亞重申，孟方將繼續奉行一箇中國政策。

sentences.english: Cyprus has always adhered to the one-China policy and been devoted to promoting China-Europe relations, the Cypriot foreign minister said.
sentences.chinese: 塞始終奉行一箇中國政策，致力於促進歐中關係。

sentences.english: Urusemal reaffirmed his government's adherence to the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 烏魯塞馬爾總統重申密政府堅定奉行一箇中國政策。

definition: to hold up (as an model)/to hold in esteem/to revere/to advocate
to advocate/to initiate/to propose/to be a proponent of (an idea or school of thought)
to follow/to abide by/to comply with/compliance
to implement/to put into practice/to carry out
